attributes.action: Shut schools and colleges as new variant is a risk to everyone
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to do this so we can help Reduce spread of virus, previously they didn’t shut them, and the virus spread much more
attributes.background: We want the government to shut the schools and colleges for students, it is highly risky for children to go with the new variant.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846
